column5: Out of Thompson manitoba this lake in one of 2 outposts for Dunlop's lodge (use to be Minor Bay camps). 4 Guys landed 17 Pike over 40, 3 at 45". Easy lake to fish 20-25 minutes at most to all spots. Numerous walleye in the 16-20" range all over, especially in any fast water. Outlet rapids last pool by foot we caught 150, 2 guys of rocks using jis or small spinners. Great fishing!http://www.dunlopfishing.com/compone...page/Itemid,1/
